Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Chicago.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
